import React,{useState} from 'react' import test from '../../images/test.jpg' import { InputText } from 'primereact/inputtext'; import './EditProfile.css' import classNames from 'classnames' export default function EditProfile() { const [formData,setFormData] = useState({ image:test, username:"Username", email:"tudorbodea12@yahoo.com", phoneNumber:"0720450578" }) const [activateButton,setActivateButton] = useState(false) function handleChange (event) { const {name,value,files} = event.target console.log(files[0]) setActivateButton(true) setFormData(prevState => ({ ...prevState, [name]:value })) } function handleSubmit (event) { event.preventDefault() } return (

Username

) }
